label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_018
content:

### CDN & Caching

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC signing enabled for 2 zones on signer-01
- [INFO] Registrar audit completed for top 50 zones; no mismatches
- [INFO] Load test of cloud edge queries successful; latency stable
- [INFO] Commit hook implemented to block CNAME-at-apex and oversized TXT sets

### Deployments & Changes
- Enabled DNSSEC signing for 2 additional zones; verified key TTLs and signature windows
- Performed registrar audit for NS and DS records; no mismatches detected
- Ran load test of cloud edge queries; confirmed stable response latency and low TCP fallback
- Implemented commit hook to block CNAME-at-apex and oversized TXT sets before pipeline apply

### Events
- Completed DNSSEC signing enablement for 2 zones; verified key TTLs and signature validity windows match policy
- Performed registrar audit for NS and DS records across top 50 zones; no mismatches detected; documented findings for compliance
- Ran load test of cloud edge queries; confirmed stable response latency and low TCP fallback
- Implemented commit hook to block CNAME-at-apex and oversized TXT sets before pipeline apply

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: S. Laurent. 0 pages. 3 tickets. Status: Normal; compliance audit and guardrails improved
